response.explain: Since this is the initial request, there's no prior code to explain or evaluate. The task is to Mine 2 oak_log and craft 2 oak_planks and 2 sticks in Minecraft using Mineflayer. I can find oak_log at distance 11.77,12.79 in pic1 and at distance 11.77,12.94 in pic2.
response.subtask:
1) Perceive and teleport near the oak_log in pic1
2) Mine 2 oak_log
3) Craft 2 oak_planks
4) Craft 2 sticks
